text:
Where can I find version 2.0 of HSSF. I am using version 1.8 Dev of HSSF. Which 
is the latest released version of HSSF.
creator: vgujjar@tcg-software.com

text:
1.I feel Bugzilla is not Q&A room XP
There is a mailinglist for POI users & developers:D
I feel,you had better to send a mail to poi-dev-help@jakarta.apache.org and 
join it.

archives:

avik@apache.org
text:
1.10 is the latest dev release. Updated front page.. will take 12 hrs to show.
2.0 is in the future. And finally, to reiterate, bugzilla is not a forum for
asking questions. 

PS:- vikranth, if you are in TCG mumbai, say hi to lokesh ;-)
